creator: brad.lee@csiro.au
text:
I have just completed another project where I have used JMeter - the third in five years.  Just wanted to say thanks for an awesome product.

Cheers
Brad

P.S. Your site said you wanted feedback, but Bugzilla seemed like the only way to do this.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
Ok, thanks very much.

Another way to participate is via the JMeter mailing lists.
Bugzilla updates are copied to the JMeter developers list, but you could get involved in the JMeter user list.

The JMeter Wiki also has a section for companies using JMeter:

http://wiki.apache.org/jakarta-jmeter/JMeterUsers
